We have multiple people identified as a succession plan if an individual leaves the organization.

We closely monitor data to spot variation in performance.  To date, no variation has been noted.  We also have a robust complaints and grievances department who communicate findings regularly.  In addition, we have a very active and highly-utilized risk management database for staff to enter concerns or raise alarms.
